title: InterpKit
description: InterpKit is a CLI (Command Line Interface) tool designed to speed up and simplify data retrieval from engineering tables, particularly the d/L function table for d/L0 value increments.

title: hand_gesture
description: Nampilin 4 gambar monyet berbeda berdasarkan gestur tangan yang terdeteksi lewat kamera

title: tidesh
description: a minimal Unix shell written in C

title: cli-audio-player
description:
Pemutar audio minimalis via terminal, ditulis dengan C++.
Gak ada UI, gak ada warna, cuma suara.
